vote.text: Amendment SA 1774, under the order of 7/23/2013, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 184.

action.text: Amendment SA 1774 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 1773.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1774, under the order of 7/23/2013, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 184.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1774 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 1773.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1774, under the order of 7/23/2013, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 65. Record Vote Number: 184.
